info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 12:29AM MDT until June 12 at 1:15AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Union County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 115 AM MDT. * At 1229 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles northwest of Sedan, or 17 miles southwest of Clayton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clayton and Sedan. This includes Highway 64 between Mile Markers 420 and 429. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. High winds and large hail can spread quickly across open rangeland.
